data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Do you prefer following a schedule that is set by someone else for you or creating your own plan? Why or why not?
data.answer: Many people believe that following a schedule that is set by someone else is the easiest way to accomplish things. However, I am more inclined to create my own plan because it suits my own needs and accommodates my own style of doing things. For instance, when I need to prepare for a test, I usually set up a plan for myself according to my usual bedtime and wake-up time. This way, I can make sure that I am energetic when I need to sit down and prepare. Therefore, I can focus and do things more efficiently which might not be possible if I follow schedules set by others.
